code:
type Address record { string street; string city; string state; string zipcode;
}; type Person record { string name; int age; Address address; };

description: Define variables using record binding pattern.
code: string myName = ""; int myAge = 0; Address myAddress = placeholder; map<anydata> otherFields = {}; { name: myName, age: myAge, address: myAddress, ...otherFields } = getPerson();
println("My Name: ", myName, " My Age: ", myAge, " My Address: ", myAddress, " Other Fields: ", otherFields);
stdout: My Name: Jack Smith My Age: 23 My Address: {"street":"380 Lakewood Dr.","city":"Desoto","state":"TX","zipcode":"75115"} Other Fields: {"occupation":"Software Engineer"}

code: string name = ""; int age = 0; Address address = placeholder; {name, age, address} = getPerson();
println("Name: ", name, " Age: ", age, " Address: ", address);
stdout: Name: Jack Smith Age: 23 Address: {"street":"380 Lakewood Dr.","city":"Desoto","state":"TX","zipcode":"75115"}

code: string street = ""; string city = ""; string state = ""; string zipcode = ""; {street, city, state, zipcode} = getAddress();
println("City: ", city, " State: ", state, " State: ", state, " Zip Code: ", zipcode);
stdout: City: Desoto State: TX State: TX Zip Code: 75115
